item.title: About
item.description: I have been working in Data Science since completing my PhD in Computer Science from Imperial College London in 2010. Details of my professional experience can be found on LinkedIn. I have experience applying Data Science and Analytics in e-commerce and digital marketing. I am involved with R Ladies Global and am responsible for editing their [blog]().

code{white-space: pre;} pre:not([class]) { background-color: white; } if (window.hljs) { hljs.configure({languages: []}); hljs.initHighlightingOnLoad(); if (document.readyState && document.readyState === "complete") { window.setTimeout(function() { hljs.initHighlighting(); }, 0); } } h1 { font-size: 34px; } h1.title { font-size: 38px; } h2 { font-size: 30px; } h3 { font-size: 24px; } h4 { font-size: 18px; } h5 { font-size: 16px; } h6 { font-size: 12px; } .

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact me on Twitter, LinkedIn or email me at abigail dot lebrecht at gmail dot com

item.title: Home
item.description: Data Science Consultant with experience in data analysis in multiple fields including e-commerce, marketing and politicss. Interested in the effective communication of data, understanding uncertainty, visualisation and coding in R. Available for consultancy in London, UK or remote work.
